title: Shadows of the Redwood
description: The popular and critically acclaimed Faire Folk Saga continues inTHE SCIONS OF SHADOW TRILOGYWhen the Redwood Forest tree shepherd disappears under mysterious circumstances, Keelie Heartwood and her elven grandmother arrive at the local Renaissance festival to investigate. Then her grandmother vanishesâ€•and Keelie finds herself ensnared in a life-or-death battle against an ancient curse, a goblin prophecy, and a diabolical alliance.
author: Gillian Summers
